  • Proof of age is required to redeem the children’s rate.
  • Children over 24months pay the same admission rate as adults.
  • Children over 3ft. must enter their respective gender locker rooms.
  • Admission price is subject to change without prior notice.
  • Our Holiday Admission pricing are based on the Federal Calendar.
  • Groups of 10 or more receive 10% discount on the total admission fee only. (all parties must be present at time of check in to receive discount)
  • Please bring your own swimsuits. (rentals or purchase available.)
  • Proper Identification is required upon entry.
  • Minors must be supervised by a guardian at all times.
  • Seniors must enter at their own risk.
